Row.Text: Trader Sid's, Inc.

Targets the [ICON_VICTORY_DIPLOMACY] Diplomatic Victory by massively boosting [ICON_GOLD] Gold generation and providing more benefit from trading with [ICON_CITY_STATE] City-States.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+3 [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+100% [ICON_CARAVAN] Land Trade Route Range.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from {TXT_KEY_BUILDING_BROADCAST_TOWER} in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+3 [ICON_FOOD] Food from [ICON_MERCHANT] Merchants.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Every [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise in a foreign Civilization's Cities increases [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with them by 2%.

[ICON_RES_SPICES] Cinnamon, [ICON_RES_SUGAR] Sugar, [ICON_RES_SALT] Salt, [ICON_RES_NUTMEG] Nutmeg, [ICON_RES_CLOVES] Cloves, [ICON_RES_PEPPER] Pepper, [ICON_RES_COFFEE] Coffee, and [ICON_RES_COCOA] Cocoa worked by the City gain +5 [ICON_GOLD] from Trader Sid's [ICON_OFFICE] Offices and [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchises.

+2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for every Global [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise. Incoming [ICON_ARROW_LEFT] Trade Routes generate +4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the City, and +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for [ICON_ARROW_RIGHT] Trade Route owner. +2% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for every [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route to a [ICON_CITY_STATE] City-State.
[ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes from Cities with a Trader Sid's Office to Cities with a Trader Sid's Franchise produce +25% additional [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
Current Office Bonus: {1_String}
Centaurus Extractors, Inc.

Supports the [ICON_VICTORY_CULTURE] Cultural and [ICON_VICTORY_SPACE] Spaceship Victories by generating large amounts of yields in coastal Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+100% [ICON_CARGO_SHIP] Sea Trade Route Range.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+8 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from {TXT_KEY_BUILDING_MINEFIELD} in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from all Specialists.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Every [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise in a foreign Civilization's Cities increases [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with them by 2%.

[ICON_RES_PEARLS] Pearls, [ICON_RES_WHALE] Whales, [ICON_RES_CRAB] Crab, and [ICON_RES_CORAL] Coral worked by the City gain +5 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Centaurus Extractors [ICON_OFFICE] Offices and [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchises.

+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for every Global [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise. +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on all Sea Tiles near the City and a further +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on Sea Resources.
[ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes from Cities with a Centaurus Extractors Office to Cities with a Centaurus Extractors Franchise grant +3% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to the origin City.
Current Office Bonus: {1_String}
Hexxon Refinery, Inc.

Supports the [ICON_VICTORY_DOMINATION] Domination and [ICON_VICTORY_SPACE] Spaceship Victories by enhancing your ability to wage late-game [ICON_WAR] warfare, amass Strategic Resources, and by increasing [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and [ICON_RESEARCH] Science output.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 additional [ICON_RES_COAL] Coal and [ICON_RES_OIL] Oil Resource for every Global [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+5 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, and [ICON_CULTURE_LOCAL] Border Growth from {TXT_KEY_BUILDING_REFINERY} in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from [ICON_ENGINEER] Engineers.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Every [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise in a foreign Civilization's Cities increases [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with them by 2%.

[ICON_RES_COAL] Coal, [ICON_RES_OIL] Oil, [ICON_RES_URANIUM] Uranium, [ICON_RES_BRAZILWOOD] Brazilwood, and [ICON_RES_GLASS] Glass worked by the City gain +8 [ICON_CULTURE_LOCAL] Border Growth Points from Hexxon Refineries [ICON_OFFICE] Offices and [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchises.

+3 [ICON_CULTURE_LOCAL] Border Growth Points for every Global [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise. +15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards Military Units. When you train a Military Unit in this City, gain [ICON_RESEARCH] Science equal to 25% of the Unit's [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production cost.
[ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes from Cities with a Hexxon Refinery Office to Cities with a Hexxon Refinery Franchise produce +50% additional [ICON_SCIENCE] Science.
Current Office Bonus: {1_String}
Giorgio Armeier, Inc.

Targets the [ICON_VICTORY_CULTURE] Cultural Victory by increasing [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person generation whilst also providing avenues to boost [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+4 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from {TXT_KEY_BUILDING_VP_MALL} in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, [ICON_GOLD] Gold, and [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from [ICON_ARTIST] Artists.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Incoming [ICON_ARROW_LEFT] Trade Routes generate +5 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the [ICON_ARROW_RIGHT] Trade Route owner.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Every [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise in a foreign Civilization's Cities increases [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with them by 2%.

[ICON_RES_SILK] Silk, [ICON_RES_COTTON] Cotton, [ICON_RES_DYE] Dye, [ICON_RES_FUR] Furs, and [ICON_RES_PERFUME] Perfume worked by the City gain +3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from Giorgio Armeier [ICON_OFFICE] Offices and [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchises.
+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +2% [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person Rate for every Global [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise. 1 [ICON_ARTIST] Artist Slot.
[ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes from Cities with a Giorgio Armeier Office to a City with a Giorgio Armeier Franchise grant +3% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture to the origin City.
Current Office Bonus: {1_String}
Firaxite Materials, Inc.

Targets the [ICON_VICTORY_SPACE] Spaceship Victory by hugely boosting [ICON_RESEARCH] Science output and infrastructural development.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+3 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from {TXT_KEY_BUILDING_STOCK_EXCHANGE} in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from [ICON_SCIENTIST] Scientists.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 additional [ICON_RES_IRON] Iron and +1 additional [ICON_RES_ALUMINUM] Aluminum for every two Global [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchises.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Every [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise in a foreign Civilization's Cities increases [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with them by 2%.

[ICON_RES_IRON] Iron, [ICON_RES_ALUMINUM] Aluminum, [ICON_RES_MARBLE] Marble, [ICON_RES_COPPER] Copper, and [ICON_RES_PORCELAIN] Porcelain worked by the City gain +3 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from Firaxite Materials [ICON_OFFICE] Offices and [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchises.

+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for every Global [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise. +10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when constructing Buildings and +10 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science when a Building is constructed, scaling with Era. +8 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science once [COLOR_CYAN]Electronics[ENDCOLOR] is discovered.
[ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes from Cities with a Firaxite Materials Office to Cities with a Firaxite Materials Franchise grant +3% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science to the origin City.
Current Office Bonus: {1_String}
TwoKay Foods, Inc.

Targets the [ICON_VICTORY_DOMINATION] Domination Victory by reducing [ICON_HAPPINESS_3] Unhappiness and providing big [ICON_FOOD] Food production to grow Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Trade Units reveal Fog of War.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+5 [ICON_FOOD] Food from {TXT_KEY_BUILDING_AGRIBUSINESS} in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 additional [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horse for every Global [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Every [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise in a foreign Civilization's Cities increases [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with them by 2%.

[ICON_RES_WINE] Wine, [ICON_RES_TRUFFLES] Truffles, [ICON_RES_CITRUS] Citrus, [ICON_RES_OLIVE] Olives, and [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horses worked by the City gain +5 [ICON_FOOD] Food from TwoKay Foods [ICON_OFFICE] Offices and [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchises.

+2 [ICON_FOOD] Food for every Global [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise. -1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_3] Unhappiness from all Needs and -2% to [ICON_CITY_STATE] Empire Size Modifier in [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]all[ENDCOLOR] Cities.
[ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes from Cities with a TwoKay Foods Office to Cities with a TwoKay Foods Franchise grant +3% [ICON_FOOD] Food to the origin City.
Current Office Bonus: {1_String}
Civilized Jewelers, Inc.

Supports the [ICON_VICTORY_CULTURE] Cultural and [ICON_VICTORY_DIPLOMACY] Diplomatic Victories with more, faster [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes, by gaining more yields from [ICON_CITY_STATE] City-States, and by starting [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Ages.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+100% Trade Unit movement speed.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+8 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from {TXT_KEY_BUILDING_AIRPORT} in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from all Specialists.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Every [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise in a foreign Civilization's Cities increases [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with them by 2%.

[ICON_RES_GOLD] Gold, [ICON_RES_SILVER] Silver, [ICON_RES_GEMS] Gems, [ICON_RES_LAPIS] Lapis Lazuli, [ICON_RES_JEWELRY] Jewelry, and [ICON_RES_AMBER] Amber worked by the City gain +5 [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points from Civilized Jewelers [ICON_OFFICE] Offices and [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchises.

+2 [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Point for every Global [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise. +10% [ICON_GOLD] Gold and [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism during [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Ages. +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from every [ICON_CITY_STATE] City State [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Friend[ENDCOLOR] and +2 [ICON_GOLD] and +1 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from every [COLOR_CYAN]Ally[ENDCOLOR].
[ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes from Cities with a Civilized Jewelers Office to a City with a Civilized Jewelers Franchise grant +3% [ICON_GOLD] Gold to the origin City.
Current Office Bonus: {1_String}
Populi Medicine, Inc.

Supports the [ICON_VICTORY_DOMINATION] Domination and [ICON_VICTORY_DIPLOMACY] Diplomatic victories by providing [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence. It also uniquely increases [ICON_PEACE] Faith generation.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Incoming [ICON_ARROW_LEFT] Trade Routes generate +5 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the City.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+3 [ICON_PEACE] Faith from Hospital in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from [ICON_CIVIL_SERVANT] Civil Servants.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Every [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise in a foreign Civilization's Cities increases [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with them by 2%.

[ICON_RES_TOBACCO] Tobacco, [ICON_RES_INCENSE] Incense, [ICON_RES_IVORY] Ivory, [ICON_RES_JADE] Jade, and [ICON_RES_TEA] Tea worked by the City gain +3 [ICON_PEACE] Faith from Populi Medicine [ICON_OFFICE] Offices and [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchises.
+1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith for every Global [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise. +2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness. 15 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with all [ICON_CITY_STATE] City-States when constructed.

[ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes from Cities with a Populi Medicine [ICON_OFFICE] Office to Cities with a Populi Medicine [ICON_FRANCHISE] Franchise grant +3% [ICON_PEACE] Faith to the origin City.
Current Office Bonus: {1_String}
